amendment.description: Amendment requires the President to report to Congress the percentage of the total cost that the U.S. will incur for any proposed U.N. military operation compared to the contribution made by other participating countries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the President to inform Congress th percentage of the total cost that the U.S. would incur for any proposed U.N. military operation compared to the contribution made by other participating countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schroeder amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
